name: Pokémon Rumble: Weekend Edition
overview: This is a mod of Pokémon Rumble (Wii) that was made for the shiny hunting community event Rumble Weekend! The original Pokémon Rumble contains only the 1st and 4th gen Pokémon, but this mod reintroduces the 2nd & 3rd gen Pokémon (and their shinies) to the game in a new terminal known as "GX"! The layer of fog on all stages has also been removed, and the collection screen has been updated to support all 493 available Pokémon! The original base game also remains fully intact in order to preserve the rarity of certain Pokémon.
